entry.summary:
Vendor: Page Thirty Three
Type: Oil Burner

The Essential Oil Burner by Page Thirty Three draws reference to a classic yet refined science them. The height of the clamp is adjustable, so the scientist can personalize to suit the size and strength of the candle and liquid.

The Limited Edition White Marble Oil Burner has been created in Collaboration with Stylist Stephanie Somebody. The white Carrara Marble was the perfect choice by Stephanie as it reflects her creative style as well as adapting well to the Oil burner’s classic aesthetic.

Includes: Burner Unit & Flask, 5 ml Australian-grown Lavender Oil, Australian-made Beeswax Candle

• Designed & Handcrafted in Australia

• Dimensions: 260 H x 210 W x 125 D mm

entry.title: Loose Leaf Dream Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Anima Mundi Apothecary
Type: Tea
Price: 16.00

Dream Tea is a soothing and calming composition of rainforest botanicals known to hold properties which enhance deep dreaming and lucidity in the mind. This formula relaxes the body and tonifies the nervous system making it an ideal nightcap.

• 2 oz

• Sustainably-Sourced Botanicals

• Organic & Vegan

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Ashwagandha, Passionflower, Skullcap, Kalea Sacatechichi, Tulsi, Kava Kava, Blue Lotus, Cornflowers, Ginger, Rose Petals, Stevia.

Directions

Steep 1-2 Tbsp in a cup of boiling water. Allow to steep for up to 15 minutes. For best results, ingest before bed on an empty stomach.

entry.title: Eau Pour Garcon - Deodorizing Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Graydon
Type: Perfume
Price: 16.00

Eau Pour Garçon translates to "Water for Boys" and this spray is the non-toxic solution for keeping the men in your life smelling fresh. Whether sports clothes, gym bag, sneakers or locker, sometimes our guys need a little extra help. Spray it directly on the odored items to help clean and refresh, feeling good knowing that it is safe for skin contact as well. The active ingredients in this formulation are potent (but non-toxic) germ exterminators with an aroma that will appeal to everyone.

• 120 ml / 4.0 fl oz

• Gluten-free

• NO nut derived ingredients

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

aqua (purified water), ethanol (ethyl alcohol), hydrogen peroxide, *ricinus communis (castor) wax, cinnamomum cassia (cinnamon) leaf oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, eucalyptus globulus (eucalyptus) leaf oil, pelargonium graveolens flower (geranium) oil, juniperus communis fruit (juniper) oil, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, citrus limon (lemon) peel oil, cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, myristica fragrans (nutmeg) kernel oil, citrus paradisi (grapefruit) peel oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil *plant based

Directions

As a Body Deodorizer: 2-3 sprays over body will do the trick to smell fresh and clean. On your Stuff: Use on counter tops, gym/hockey bags, stinky shoes, and in your locker. On your Hands + Feet: Apply onto dirty, sticky hands and/or feet. Brush together lightly to let dry. Re-apply as needed.

entry.title: Before Bed Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Graydon

Before Bed Spray has the means to woo you (and your children) off to blissful sleep. Mist the pillows, sheets and air in the room and enjoy the soothing and comforting aroma of pure lavender, sweet orange combined with other effective, non-toxic, antimicrobial ingredients. Take comfort knowing that you are helping to minimize indoor microbes at the same time creating a calm environment to help facilitate a good, sound sleep.

• 120 ml / 4.0 fl oz

• Gluten-free

• NO nut derived ingredients

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

aqua (purified water), ethanol (ethyl alcohol), hydrogen peroxide, *ricinus communis (castor) wax, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, citrus sinensis (blood orange). *plant based

Mist a few sprays over bed sheets, pillows, stuffed animals before sleep.

entry.title: Charcoal Purifying Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Skin Care Set
Price: 30.00

 A Travel Kit of powerful, purifying White Charcoal that cleanses skin, hair + body.

Kit Includes:

Edible Kuro Powder Sachets, Small Kuro Soap Bar, Binchotan Fine 12 cm, 100 ml Hai Body Soap, 100 ml Shiro Shampoo and 100 ml Kuro Shampoo

Additional Information

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification.

• White Charcoal is made from wood, but differs from regular charcoal in just about every other way. To produce the white charcoal used, the highest quality branches are individually selected from slow growing, hard wood trees in the mountain forests of Japan and Korea. These forests are maintained by craftsmen who harvest from them in such a way that new branches are encouraged to grow. These new branches absorb higher levels of CO2 than their predecessors, giving greater benefit to the surrounding environment and providing a plentiful harvest for the craftsmen. The natural minerals that the trees absorb as they grow are captured inside the White Charcoal, imparting it with its purifying/detoxifying effects.

Sort Of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

Ingredients:

Please refer to individual product pages for more detail ingredient information!

Directions:

EDIBLE KURO POWDER

As part of a detoxifying diet, take 1 sachet of EDIBLE KURO POWDER directly in your mouth and drink with a glass of water at least 1.5 hours before or after a meal. If you have diarrhea, do as above, but with less water. For the rest of the day, drink plenty of water. Warning: You should always consult your doctor before you use EDIBLE KURO POWDER as part of a treatment or diet. Add to toothpaste or face masks for an extra cleansing and purifying effect. Add to a footbath to boost the cleansing effect and prevent growth of fungus and bacteria.

BINCHOTAN

This small BINCHOTAN fits in a smaller drinking bottle and is pre-boiled and ready to use! Fill or Refill the bottle with cold tap water whenever you like, and wait for at least two hours, preferably overnight, to efficiently purify and enrich your water. When not in use, you can dry and store the BINCHOTAN in a container or plastic bag. We recommend that you boil your BINCHOTAN for one minute once a week (when in use), to keep it fresh and fully active!

entry.title: Gluten-Free, Raw, & Activated Mulberry Overnight Oats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moon Juice
Type: Gourmet Food
Price: 20.00

The creaminess of these oats comes from the minerals and fibers drawn out by soaking them overnight in nut or seed milk. Mixed with naturally sweet mulberries, warmly spiced pumpkin seeds, and coconut makes this the perfect way to supercharge your day.

• Gluten-Free + Raw

• Non-GMO

• 16 oz

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

Activated oats*, maple syrup*, coconut*, pumpkin seeds*, mulberries*, activated chia seeds*, cinnamon*, pink salt, nutmeg* (*indicates organic)

Directions

Combine 1 part dry mix with 2 parts milk of your choice. Let sit in refrigerator 4+ hours or overnight. Add more liquid for a looser porridge or eat as is for a muesli.

entry.title: Hakutan White Charcoal (Medium)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Home Cleaning
Price: 108.75

This aesthetically pleasing piece of powerful White Charcoal made from hard Korean Holm oak is a natural and electricity-free air freshener. Working especially well in the bathroom or kitchen where it will effectively regulate humidity levels, Hakutan cleanses the air of pollution, steam and odors.

White Charcoal, or "active charcoal" has long been known for its purifying, enriching and restorative benefits. In Japan a Hakutan is often placed next to the computer, where the negative ions that it emits help to neutralize the harmful effects of electromagnetic waves.

• A single sculptural piece of White Charcoal

• Size: Medium

• Made in Denmark

Sort of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. A Hakutan sculpture will last for a lifetime of use, provided it is kept clean and occasionally revitalized in direct sunlight. Should you wish to discard it, nature will gladly take it back. Acting as an excellent fertilizer, crush and mix with potting soil where it will add nourishment, regulate the PH balance, and assist in absorbing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Korean Holm oak

Directions

Handle Hakutan with care, placing it directly on any dry surface in a room you wish to purify. Keep the Hakutan free of dust with a vacuum cleaner. Occasionally expose to direct sunlight and let it dry completely to revitalize its ability to adsorb impurities and moisture from the air.

entry.title: Edible Kuro Charcoal Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Multipurpose Home Product
Price: 18.00

A treasured ingredient in traditional Japanese kitchens, Edible Kuro Powder is made with pulverized White Charcoal, traditionally handcrafted in Korea from organic Red Pine needles and known for centuries for its highly effective purifying, enriching and detoxifying qualities.

This powerful charcoal powder can be added during cooking to boost the nutritional value of any food or mixed with water for a detoxifying drink. Keep in mind this potent natural powder will color your food dramatically black or grey.

Sort of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

• Fifteen 4g packets

• Made in Denmark

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Pinus Densiflora (Red Pine Needle) 94.9%, Olea Europace. L (Olive Oil) 2.81%, Eucalyptus Oil 0.7%, Glutinous Rice Powder (Sweet Rice) 1.51%

Directions

As part of a detoxifying diet, take 1 tablespoon with a glass of water at least 1.5 hours before or after a meal.

Add to toothpaste or face masks for an extra cleansing and purifying effect.

Add to a footbath to boost the cleansing effect and prevent growth of fungus and bacteria.

Fill into a small cotton bag or a coffee filter, and place inside your shoes to remove moisture and odors.

It is recommended that you consult your doctor before you use Edible Kuro Powder as part of any treatment or diet.
